risks.divergence_summary: The company's internal policy on policy review lacks the specific, mandatory quarterly review frequency and reporting requirement for data protection and change management policies as stipulated by the new regulation, creating a direct compliance risk.
risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: 1. Purpose Establish a structured process for reviewing, updating, approving, and versioning all internal policies — ensuring governance, accountability, and continuous alignment with business needs and regulatory requirements.
risks.new_rule_excerpt: A l l i n t e r n a l p o l i c i e s r e l a t e d t o d a t a p r o t e c t i o n a n d c h a n g e m a n a g e m e n t m u s t b e r e v i e w e d a n d u p d a t e d a t l e a s t q u a r t e r l y w i t h e v i d e n c e o f r e v i e w s u b m i t t e d t o C N D P .
risks.recommendation: The legal team must immediately update the 'Policy Review & Governance Procedure' to explicitly include the mandatory quarterly review frequency for data protection and change management policies, and the requirement to submit evidence of review to CNDP, to ensure full compliance with Article 8.3 of the new regulation and avoid severe penalties.

risks.divergence_summary: The company's internal policy generally states its purpose is to ensure access control during offboarding, but it fails to specify the mandatory immediate access revocation within two hours of employee termination as required by the new regulation.
risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: properly offboarding departing personnel — to ensure data security, access control
risks.new_rule_excerpt: Immediate revocation upon employee termination (within 2 hours)
risks.recommendation: The legal team must immediately revise the 'Onboarding & Offboarding Procedures' policy to explicitly include the requirement for immediate access revocation within two hours of employee termination, and ensure operational procedures are updated and enforced accordingly.

risks.divergence_summary: The company's internal policy requires an annual review, whereas the new regulation mandates a quarterly review for all data protection and change management policies, with evidence submitted to the CNDP.
risks.conflicting_policy_excerpt: The policy must be reviewed at least once per year, or when relevant laws/regulations change, or when MarocAgency’s services change.
risks.new_rule_excerpt: All internal policies related to data protection and change management must be reviewed and updated at least quarterly with evidence of review submitted to CNDP.
risks.recommendation: Immediately update the internal policy to reflect a mandatory quarterly review cycle for all data protection and change management policies, and establish a process for submitting evidence of these reviews to the CNDP as required by Article 8.3 of the new regulation.
